game.name: Babysitter Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Babysitter Simulator is a casual game which prepares you for mature life! Your mission seems simple at first sight, but it is not so.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Babysitter Simulator is a casual game which prepares you for mature life! Your mission seems simple at first sight, but it is not so.
